title: Learner Engagement Strategies for Sustainable e-Learning Platform Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in online learning environments
context.additional_context: A mobile-optimized learning environment centered on science content, integrating collaborative tools for project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain personality trait (Big Five) analysis methods for improving e-learning platform stickiness
Learners can visualize causal relationships between platform satisfaction, engagement, and stickiness using structural equation modeling
Learners can present project deliverables outlining science content design strategies tailored to personality types
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
